data.title: FAMILY TREE
data.text:
OTEIL BURBRIDGEb. August 24, 1964

Washington, DC

Oteil Burbridge - Bass, Vocals

Apt. Q258 (Jeff Sipe) - Drums

Lead Guitar, Slide Guitar, Vocals

(on August 4, 1998 and August 5, 1998 replaced by Derek Trucks)
